title: WE NEED EXO AS AN ANNOUNCER

embed.description: The Special/Hidden/Secret Interactions for the new ultimate skin, Gun Goddess Miss Fortune. Purchase RP here and help support this channel via the amazon affiliate program (NA): http://amzn.to/2leXAxO Shows all the specific interactions Gun Goddess Miss Fortune has. Stay upto date with information by following me on twitter: https://twitter.com/SkinSpotlights

body: ~~EDI~~ Exo is grade A savage i fucking love him/her/it

replies.body: yea, the AI of the suit is very likeable. They should have just sold this skin as a 1820 and the other version as a chroma bundle for 3250
But they are more than just "chromas"
But you get all of that in a skin for a cheaper price than what you mentioned.

"You are legendary. At killing! The best kind of legendary."
"An enemy is killing all your friends! I respect their work ethic."
"An enemy has been murdered. Brutally! This game is fun."
"Your inhibitor has been destroyed. It was my friend. It looked at me."
"Reminder: destroyed towers are the ghosts of your failure. Have a great day!"

actually that last line might be too tilty. forget i typed that.

zomg, tilt me pls exo.

Do that and take my money Riot.
This needs to happen. It could introduce some mild randomness in player decision making, which ultimately is an improvement to gameplay.....right? Like plants :D
Can we get Exo as a champion?
Right though? That would honestly be kinda cool.
Exo is the Best AI voice yet :D
Exo is too sassy to NOT be an announcer at some point.
Nah i preffer Ordis from Warframe

Yeah, I'd bang Exo too, he seems pretty hawt.

I'm just gonna say this: I'm not a huge fan of AI having a good voice.

{{champion:163}}
he's the reason I'm buying the skin although the skin is kinda disappointing :/
I'm disappointed there's no taunts towards Dreadnova GP though.
So she's a space pirate? So Space Pirate Sarah? Riot confirmed good taste in hentai
it would be so cool if they make an Officer Ekko skin xD
